content:
Namukuru’s bicycle 
 Munanga ASb teachers 
 English 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
  
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 Namukuru and her 
 
 brother are ready 
 
 for schol. 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 1  
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 Namukuru caries 
 
 her brother on 
 
 her bicycle. 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 2  
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 Their friends cher 
 
 for them as they 
 
 ride into schol. 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 3  
 
 
 
 
 
 
 While they are 
 
 in the clasrom, 
 
 a monkey arives 
 
 outside. 
 
 
 
 The monkey 
 
 rides away on 
 
 Namukuru’s bicycle! 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 4  
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 The children chase 
 
 the monkey. 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 5  
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 The monkey leaves 
 
 the bicycle under 
 
 a tre. 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 6  
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 The monkey swims 
 
 to an island in the 
 
 midle of the lake. 
 
 He climbs high into 
 
 a tre. 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 7  
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 The monkey waves 
 
 godbye! 
 
 
 
 The children wave back. 
 
 
 
 Namukuru has her 
 
 bicycle again. 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 8
